actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

official_title: To amend the Foreign Trade Zones Act to clarify that crude oil and derivatives thereof consumed in refining operations are not subject to duty under the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Foreign Trade Zones Act to declare that crude oil and its derivatives admitted into a foreign trade zone and consumed in the refining process shall not be subject to duty under the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States.

titles.title: To amend the Foreign Trade Zones Act to clarify that crude oil and derivatives thereof consumed in refining operations are not subject to duty under the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States.
